channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-21793] CBO retrieves column stats even if hive.stats.fetch.column.stats is set to false
item.description: When we go through CBO, we end up ignoring the flag value and we always retrieve column stats.
item.summary: CBO retrieves column stats even if hive.stats.fetch.column.stats is set to false

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
